extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    Level 2 or above.
EXCLUSION    No more than 6.0 units from HIST 248/3.0; HIST 249/3.0; HIST 272/6.0

basic.description:
A survey of political, economic, and social developments in the United States from its colonial beginnings to the post-World War II era.
NOTE    Offered only as a distance course. Consult Continuing and Distance Studies.
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: United States, Colonial Era to Present
